text: ? Apple is certainly making WWDC a hardware conference this year - - it just unveiled a new MacBook Pro running Intel's newer Ivy Bridge processors on the San Francisco gathering's opening day.?  I have used a broken mouse on my MacBook Pro for > 6 months in anticipation of this.. ..  now if that pesky store. apple.com would just come back online!
title: Apple unveils new MacBook Pro with Ivy Bridge at WWDC.
